content.en:
# What Customer Sees in Approval Center

When your customer opens the approval link, they arrive at the Approval Center - a specially designed view of the press release.

## The Approval Link

Your customer receives a link like:
```
https://celeropress.com/freigabe/abc123xyz
```

**Important:**
- No login required
- Works on desktop, tablet, and smartphone
- Secure and encrypted

## What Customer Sees

### 1. Header with Branding

At the top, customer sees:
- **Your logo** (from branding settings)
- **Status badge**: e.g., "Under Review", "Approved"
- **Project name**: Press release title
- **Customer**: Company name

[Screenshot: Header in approval center]

### 2. Press Release Preview

Customer sees press release exactly as it will be sent:

- **Headline**: Large heading
- **Lead paragraph**: First paragraph (bold)
- **Main text**: Full content
- **Quotes**: Highlighted in blockquote format
- **Boilerplates**: e.g., "About the Company", "Press Contact"

**Formatting:**
All HTML formatting displayed correctly:
- Bold, italic
- Paragraphs
- Lists
- Links

[Screenshot: Press release preview]

### 3. Attached Media (if any)

If you added media, customer sees:

**Images:**
- Thumbnail view
- Click opens fullscreen
- Download button

**Files:**
- PDF, Word, etc.
- Filename and size
- Download button

**Folders:**
- Name and description
- Number of contained files

[Screenshot: Media gallery]

### 4. PDF History (if PDF created)

Customer sees:
- **Current PDF version**: For download
- **Previous versions**: If changes were made
- **Version number**: e.g., "Version 2"
- **Date**: When created

**Customer can:**
- Download current PDF
- Compare previous versions

[Screenshot: PDF versions]

### 5. Communication

Customer sees all previous messages:

**Example:**
```
[Avatar] John Doe (Agency)
03/15/2024, 10:30
"Please review especially the numbers in second paragraph."

[Avatar] Jane Smith (Customer)
03/15/2024, 14:15
"The price in third paragraph is wrong. Should be $99, not $89."

[Avatar] John Doe (Agency)
03/15/2024, 15:00
"Thanks! Corrected the price. Please review new version."
```

**Customer can:**
- Read all messages
- Chronologically sorted (newest at bottom)
- Distinction: Agency (blue) vs. Customer (green)

[Screenshot: Communication history]

### 6. Decision Area

Most important area - where customer makes decision:

**3 Options:**

#### Option 1: Approve ‚úÖ

Green button: **"Approve"**

**What happens:**
- Status changes to "Approved"
- You receive immediate email notification
- Customer sees confirmation: "Thank you for approval!"
- Press release can now be distributed

#### Option 2: Request Changes ‚úèÔ∏è

Orange button: **"Request Changes"**

**Customer sees:**
- Text field for feedback
- Placeholder: "What would you like changed?"
- Character counter

**Customer writes e.g.:**
```
- Please change price in third paragraph from $89 to $99
- Shorten quote from Dr. Schmidt
- Event date is wrong: should be March 20
```

**What happens:**
- Feedback is saved
- You receive email notification with feedback
- Status changes to "Changes Requested"
- Customer sees confirmation: "Your change requests have been submitted."

#### Option 3: Reject ‚ùå

Red button: **"Reject"** (optionally visible)

**What happens:**
- Status changes to "Rejected"
- You receive email notification
- Project can be archived

[Screenshot: Decision buttons]

### 7. Info Box

At bottom, customer sees info box:

```
üí° Note on approval process
After your approval, the press release can be distributed by the agency. 
If you request changes, the agency will be notified and adjust the release accordingly.
```

### 8. Footer with Your Contact Info

At very bottom, customer sees:

**From branding settings:**
- **Company name**: e.g., "PR Agency Doe"
- **Address**: Street, ZIP, City
- **Phone**: Clickable (tel: link)
- **Email**: Clickable (mailto: link)
- **Website**: Link
- **Copyright**: ¬© 2024 PR Agency Doe

[Screenshot: Footer with contact info]

## Responsive Design

Approval center adapts to all devices:

**Desktop:**
- Clear overview, everything at a glance
- Large buttons
- Side navigation

**Tablet:**
- More compact view
- Vertical layout
- Touch-optimized

**Smartphone:**
- Fullscreen view
- Simplified navigation
- Large touch targets

## What Customer Does NOT See

**Internal information:**
- ‚ùå Your CeleroPress interface
- ‚ùå Other projects
- ‚ùå Internal notes
- ‚ùå Distribution lists
- ‚ùå Analytics data

**Only customer-relevant information:**
- ‚úÖ The press release
- ‚úÖ Attached media
- ‚úÖ Communication history
- ‚úÖ Decision options

## Common Customer Questions (and your answers)

### "Do I need to log in?"

**Answer:**
No, approval link works without login. Just open link and review press release.

### "Can I make changes later?"

**Answer:**
Yes, as long as press release hasn't been distributed yet. Just request changes via link.

### "How long is link valid?"

**Answer:**
Link is valid until [expiration date]. After that, you need to request new link.

### "Can I download PDF?"

**Answer:**
Yes, in "PDF Versions" section you can download current version.

## Next Steps

- [Create approval link](/support/en/freigabe-link-erstellen)
- [Process feedback and changes](/support/en/feedback-aenderungen-bearbeiten)
- [Monitor approval status](/support/en/freigabe-status)
